name: Thorn Gristle
description:
Music was created with Reaper. I wanted a driving beat with an epic melody. Hopefully I delivered.

Royalty-free stock photos were used as a starting point for some art. Wombo's art app was also helpful in creating nice textures. Any image used from either source has been heavily modified by me using tools such as GIMP and Inkscape.

https://www.pexels.com/photo/miniature-skull-model-5427684/

https://www.pexels.com/photo/shallow-focus-photography-of-flowers-1101112/

https://www.pexels.com/photo/cactus-plant-3067705/
